page.title: 10Activities
page.content:
In a list of sparetime activities, the daughter of the parent mentioned on page 9 listed her activities as follows: Monday - Country dancing after school Tuesday - Swimming Club at Worsley Pool from 7.30 to 8.00 Wednesday - Rounders after school Saturday - Dancing at Memorial Road Methodist Hall 9.10 to 10.30 Sunday - Sunday School at Edgefold Hall from 10.30 to 11.30
Activities at home include - playing out, watching TV, using the computer and flute practice.
She also spends some time shopping, goes to visit her grandparents at the weekend and washes her hair on a Saturday and a Wednesday.
